alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Henry; Patrick; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 11:55PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of southwestern Pittsylvania, Henry, east central Patrick and south central Franklin Counties as well as the City of Martinsville through 1245 AM EDT... At 1154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sanville to Axton. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding of poor drainage and low-lying areas. Ponding of water on roadways and highways. Some low water crossings may become flooded. Locations impacted include... Martinsville... Bassett... Axton... Leatherwood... Villa Heights... Chatmoss... and Collinsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
